name: LighTaker
description:
This is a game where you control a little Grim Reaper to take the light out of the world.

Controls:

Left Mouse Button - attack

WASD or arrows - walk

Pause - a button on the bottom right corner of the screen

THE GAME IS LOUD, BUT IT HAS A VOLUME SLIDER IN THE OPTIONS MENU. TURN IT DOWN IN THE SFX SLIDER.
